mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.app_id, m.begin_time, m.device_id, m.end_time, m.`status`, m.total_time, m.user_id FROM device d LEFT JOIN meterage m ON d.id = m.device_id AND d.mac_addr = #{macAddr} WHERE m.`status` = 0
SELECT m.id, m.app_id, m.begin_time, m.device_id, m.end_time, m.`status`, m.total_time, m.user_id FROM device d LEFT JOIN meterage m ON d.id = m.device_id AND d.id = #{deviceId} WHERE m.`status` = 0

SELECT m.id, d.id deviceId, d.`name` deviceName, d.mac_addr macAddr, d.intranet_ip intranetIp, m.begin_time beginTime, m.end_time endTime, m.total_time totalTime, m.`status` FROM meterage m LEFT JOIN device d ON m.device_id = d.id
( d.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR d.intranet_ip LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') )
AND ( m.status = #{status} )
AND ( m.begin_time BETWEEN #{beginDateTime} and #{endDateTime} OR m.end_time BETWEEN #{beginDateTime} and #{endDateTime} )
order by m.begin_time desc
